item.title: Please remove allies
item.dc:creator: Vandalay
item.description:
Marluxion:

I feel as if king needs an investigative ability of some description. He wouldn’t feel like a leader if he had no leads tbh.

I disagree, a LEADER, is one who organizes people to use their abilities in the optimal way. He takes the information people brings him, makes determinations of how valid that information is. basically if he can judge the claims he gives the possibility for the investigatives to accuse without outing themselves, which is damn strong.

As an Investigator, he’s basically a dues ex-machina. Oh did the king find you… well ok well you can’t try and convince anyone he isn’t really king… in the first 3 or 4 days it’s pretty unlikely he’d sacrifice his cover yet… so 99% chance he’s either a good king doing his job right, or an evil/neutral king that wants to kill an evil/neutral to avoid suspicion, either way there’s no rational reason to discuss it, time to hang the SoB that’s been outed by the king.

Really they might as well give the king “automatically send someone to the stand and auto execute” for the direct effectiveness of a kings investigative abilities in the early days. There’s no wiggle room, no discussion, really no plausible reason to think he’s wrong beyond a lucky scorned/fool interfering.

I agree there, was hugely popular among the experienced players in the testing, then as soon as it hit public, it took the general public more than a day to adjust… and rather than adjust they whined, and the dev’s were waay to quick to double back.

To me though, I think a better comprimise… is to make neutrals appear as bd to the king. You can’t deny or CC or anything to a king… so it shouldn’t be used as an auto LOSE. (Note I don’t mind an assasain, or a single cultist etc… dying, I used the word LOSE because that is different than dying, IE BD and Unseen/cult still win with their team, but with the exception of mercenary, most neutrals goals do not outlive themselves.
